pr_title: Added root directory in file system

timeline.message: Added root directory in file system

timeline.bodyText: Does this need to be part of the public API?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: It doesn't have to be. I'l change it to private.
replies.author: gapra-msft

timeline.author: alzimmermsft
